20110110190909.000|20110110190910.000|CC1|HIS LEFT HAND.

20110110190912.000|20110110190913.000|CC1|WHILE I'M ABLE TO GET THE       
20110110190913.000|20110110190914.000|CC1|MAGAZINE.                       
20110110190914.000|20110110190915.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY ALL MANAGED   
20110110190915.000|20110110190917.000|CC1|TO HOLD THE SHOOTER DOWN UNTIL

20110110194443.000|20110110194444.000|CC1|GO.

20110110194446.000|20110110194449.000|CC1|HIGH DESERTS THIS MORNING.      
20110110194449.000|20110110194450.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS, THAT COLD AIR     
20110110194450.000|20110110194452.000|CC1|HUGS THE PRESSURE DIFFERENCE    
20110110194452.000|20110110194453.000|CC1|AND WE SEE WINDS SQUEEZE

20110110194454.000|20110110194457.000|CC1|AND WE WARM UP THE CLOSER WE

20110110194500.000|20110110194501.000|CC1|WINDS AND UNFORTUNATELY, THE

20110110194503.000|20110110194505.000|CC1|MAKING HEADLINES ESPECIALLY IN  
20110110194505.000|20110110194505.000|CC1|THE SOUTH.

20110110194508.000|20110110194510.000|CC1|EAST BRINGING SIX INCHES OF     
20110110194510.000|20110110194512.000|CC1|SNOW IN A RARE PLACE, ATLANTA,  
20110110194512.000|20110110194514.000|CC1|ALABAMA GOT 11 INCHS AND NOW    
20110110194514.000|20110110194515.000|CC1|THE SAME SYSTEM CONTINUING TO   
20110110194515.000|20110110194518.000|CC1|MOVE UP THE EASTERN SEABOARD.   
20110110194518.000|20110110194518.000|CC1|CHECK ATLANTA FOR FLIGHT DELAYS 
20110110194518.000|20110110194520.000|CC1|AS WELL AS THE CAROLINAS AND
